jd: From: Pranshu, K&K Global Talent Solutions Inc pranshu71@knkglobaltalents.com Reply to: pranshu71@knkglobaltalents.com Nee local and 15+ years of candidate Title: .NET FullStack Developer with Angular Visa: USC, GCLocation: McKinney, TX(Hybrid – 3 Days Onsite)End Client: First US Bank 2 WebEx interviews followed by a mandatory face-to-face interviewRequired Skills & Experience:15+ years of experience in C# development with .NET Core and ASP.NET.Proven track record of leading projects or working as an independent contributor in previous roles.Expertise in RESTful API development and Angular front-end development.Strong understanding of API lifecycle management, security (OAuth2, JWT), and performance optimization.Experience in cloud environments, particularly Azure, and working with Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines.Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain technical solutions clearly and confidently.Additional Experience (Preferred):Experience with Docker/Kubernetes for microservices.Familiarity with Azure Okta Integrations.Previous financial services or banking industry experience is a plus.
